items.answer: We accommodate both small custom orders and large-scale mass production requirements, with flexible MOQ based on component complexity.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush orders are available for urgent requirements.

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certifications, with rigorous quality control processes and advanced CNC precision machining.

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper, providing comprehensive material expertise for diverse industrial applications.
